title: Indeterminate form
text: Substitute $$x$$ with the value $$x$$ approaches to. If the function results in one of these indeterminate form: $$\frac{0}{0}$$, $$\frac{\infty}{\infty}$$ or $$\frac{-\infty}{\infty}$$, we apply L’Hôpital’s Rule.
